duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage scheduling, resource planning, and item specific training for handscored contracts.
Coordinate with program and project managers to ensure projects are ready for active scoring.
Manage a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring.
Perform post-project work and data analysis.
Apply science expertise to item development and scoring processes, including in meetings with clients and educators.
Communicate with a variety of roles through chat, email, phone, and videoconference meetings.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, Scorers, and educators in the expectations and duties of their roles.
Train Science and potentially Math items to a large scorer population.
Manage in-person and virtual interactions with customers and educators.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science, Physical Sciences, or related field (Master's preferred)
